cmput301t4.gameswap.Models

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301t4.gameswap.Models.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User model contains information about the trades, for example, their name, contact information, their friends, trades made, current trades and their notifications FriendList is just a list of other traders

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      This is the contructor for the User model which is called when the user registers for an account
